Question: How easy is it to use the application without encountering errors?
How quickly does the application respond when you click buttons or perform actions?
How reliable is the application - does it work consistently without unexpected issues?
How well does the application save your work and progress?
How well does the application work across different devices (phone, tablet, computer)?
How easy is it to find what you're looking for in the application?
How clear are the instructions and guidance provided by the application?
How easy is it to complete tasks in the application?
How helpful are the messages and notifications you receive while using the application?
How well does the application remember your preferences and settings?
How attractive and professional does the application look?
How easy is it to read the text and see the images in the application?
How well does the application look on your device's screen?
How pleasant are the colors and visual elements used in the application?
How well do the visual elements help you understand how to use the application?
